name: Robots VS Aliens (Neonloop Studios)
description:
In this intense endless Tower Defense game, you must protect your bunker from the alien invasion using custom designed robots. You can choose a different hat, targeting and gun for each robot, each having their strengths and weaknesses. As time goes on, more and stronger aliens will start showing up.

This game was made for Jonas Tyroller's WOWIE Game Jam 4.0.

The Web version is buggy, playing the PC version instead is recommended. Also, in the Web version, there is an unfinished weapon called TNT, it does nothing and we are sorry for leaving it in.

!WARNING: SMALL BUG: When starting the game for the first time you will he put in the tutorial mode. However for some reason a bug doesn’t allow you to lose in that game mode. So please close and reopen the game after learning the basics and click “PLAY” on the menu as the bug isn’t present there. THANK YOU!❤️
